jadacz.server
Class DBConnection

java.lang.Object
  jadacz.server.DBConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
public class DBConnection
extends Object
implements Closeable

Class of database connections. Note: use static init() before creating any connection object.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Szymon 'tecku' Kordyaczny
